creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
When the visible-in-navigation state of a document is changed using the menu
(tiny icon), the icon state and the visibility of the document do not match.
This can be reproduced on the zones server. I'm using firefox on OS X.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> When the visible-in-navigation state of a document is changed using the menu
> (tiny icon), the icon state and the visibility of the document do not match.
> This can be reproduced on the zones server. I'm using firefox on OS X.

i just reproduced this problem. how did we break this? i think it used to work...
Strange, I can't reproduce it in my working copy ...
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Tested it against latest trunk and I can't reproduce. Reopen if problem shows up
again.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
